home.p: I am a passionate full stack developer. I have learned skills in front-end technologies like React, as well as back-end technologies like Nodejs, MySQL and PostgresSQL. My goal is to leverage my knowledge to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences

abtme.p1: Hello my name is Jose Maria, I am an administrator as my first profession. My passion for programming started after the pandemic.
abtme.p2: Although my first approach in the programming field was when I took an excel macros course in college, it was only in 2022 that I was able to experiment with technologies such as Visual Studio Code, Javascript and some Python.
abtme.p3: Programming is a field full of opportunities and continuous learning in which I want to go deeper.

projects.p: During the learning of technologies for both front-end and back-end I was able to develop some projects applying what I learned.

skills.p: In the learning process i used various applications and technologies for the full stack development of web pages.

contact.p: Don´t hesitate! Drop me a line and I´ll get back to you ASAP!.
